H0.text: Blocked sunlight casts a shadow is the best example of a chemical reaction.

H1.text: Sunlight evaporates water from a lake is the best example of a chemical reaction.

H2.text: Oxygen absorbing sunlight to form ozone molecules is the best example of a chemical reaction.

H3.text: A prism refracts sunlight into light of different wavelengths is the best example of a chemical reaction.

A4.text: Sunlight converted santonin to a yellow photoproduct.

A5.text: The photon is absorbed by a sensitizer (antenna molecule or ion) which then effects redox reactions on the organic substrate.
